resources.string: Cricket icon made by\nFreepik from www.flaticon.com
Warning icon made by\nPixel Buddha from www.flaticon.com
Success icon made by\nFreepik from www.flaticon.com
Get the system key from the device \n Enter it using the SYNCHRONIZE button
Put your food leftovers in the device \n Refill the water bottle when needed
Press the PICK UP MODE button \n Wait 2 hours for the conditions to be adequate
Check that the crickets are inactive in the cage \n Lock and pick up the cage
When launching the system, leave the door open \n Close it when you see that eggs have hatched
